title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 

(No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 12 – 

(i) 

in paragraph (1), by the substitution of “Subject to 
Regulation (1A), and except to” for “Except to”, and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 

(1): 

“(1A) (a) Paragraph 1 shall not apply to the premises 
known as the Button Factory, Curved Street, 
Temple Bar, Dublin 2 in respect of an event 
held at 
the period 
beginning at 8.30 pm on the 30th day of 
September 2021 and ending at 1.00 am on the 
1st day of October 2021 where the number of 
persons attending the premises does not exceed

text_raw:
450. 

that premises during 

(b) For the purposes of subparagraph (a), in 
reckoning the number of persons attending the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [500] 3 

event referred to in that subparagraph, no 
account shall be taken of persons attending the 
event in a professional capacity, in the course 
of their employment, or in fulfilment of a 
contract for services.”, and 

(b) 

in Regulation 13(8), in the definition of “relevant premises”, by 
the substitution of “(other than a relevant accommodation 
premises or, during the period beginning at 8.30 pm on the 30th 
day of September 2021 and ending at 1.00 am on the 1st day of 
October 2021, the premises known as the Button Factory, Curved 
Street, Temple Bar, Dublin 2)” for “(other than a relevant 
accommodation premises)”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 September, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 [S.I. 217 of 2021] to provide 
for the holding of a pilot event. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [500] 5
